name: SproutSpy
description: Helper tool for any home gardener. Check your growth zone and find out what plants to plant!

name: Weathertool
description: Keep track of the weather at your facorite locations. Add and remove locations and view 5 day forecast.

name: Tech Blog
description: A blog for tech related news and articles.

name: Webnotes
description: A simple note taking app. Create, edit, and delete notes in your browser.

name: Day Planner
description: A planner for your day. Create and edit your day's events. Events are saved to local storage. You can also add events in advance to upcoming days.

name: Code Quiz
description: Test your javascript knowledge. Answer as many questions as you can. Wrong answers will reduce the available time!
